pageContext.claim: “They're coming, and many other companies are coming. They're all pouring into our company. They want to be-- they're coming into our country at every level.”
pageContext.analysis: Factories were returning jobs to the United States for a decade before Trump became president, according to data on the website of the advocacy group Reshoring Initiative. Foreign investment in the United States grew at a slower annual pace in the first two years of Trump’s tenure than during Barack Obama’s presidency, {according to Commerce Department data released in July, 2019}.
